channel.title: Need help with :: commands
channel.description:
hey guy's,
i was wondering if anyone could help me with making a command that gives you unlimited hp and spec and a ::kill (username) command for a 508 server and for the player rights of 2 :D
thankyou :D :D

item.title: Need help with :: commands
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

else if (cmd[0].equals("kill") && p.username.equals("Your Name")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just StrikedDown " + p2.username); p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have just been striked down by " + p.username); p2.requestGFX(1621, 0); p2.appendHit(255, 0); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }
